title: Coleen Rooney breaks social media silence after epic showdown with Rebekah Vardy
text:

Coleen Rooney has broken her social media silence following her epic showdown with Rebekah Vardy.

Wayne Rooney's wife had been silent ever since her statement accusing Rebekah 's account of leaking stories about her went viral.

But 11 days later, she made a return to share a beautiful picture of her youngest son Cass sitting on the grass, wrapped up for winter in a colourful coat.

Coleen also revealed that she's been unable to join her family in Barbados for a half term holiday due to illness.

She said: "Lovely morning in the fresh air with Cass. We had planned to be with the rest of our family in Barbados for half term break. Unfortunately I became poorly with an infection before we were due to leave. I am not able to join them for the time being, even though I am feeling better"

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Coleen went on to say that Wayne and their other children, Kai, Klay and Kit, are on the holiday without her, and that she wanted to make the reason why clear.

Fans felt for her.

One said: "Pretty sad that you have had to explain yourself to everyone why your not with your family."

And another jumped to her defence in a bid to shut the haters up.

They said: "Some of the replies on here are so heartless! Coleen I hope you are feeling better soon the baby is gorgeous! Enjoy some mummy cass time making memories while the big boys are having fun on holiday"

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

(Image: AFP/Getty Images)

Coleen and Rebekah have been at loggerheads ever since her accusations.

Coleen was nicknamed Wagatha Christie in the wake of the scandal after unveiling her detective work.

She said she had planted false stories on her private Instagram account and revealed in an epic statement that she'd blocked every account but Rebekah's from viewing her Stories to test whether or not the information would leak.

And when they did, she told the world what had happened in a bombshell statement that went viral.

(Image: Getty Images)

Rebekah has vehemently denied leaking stories about Coleen and said in her own statement that she was "disgusted" that she even had to deny it, especially when she's heavily pregnant.

She was so upset that she cut her Dubai holiday short and flew back home.

Becky claimed she has hired a forensic IT expert to prove her innocence and is considering legal action.

But representatives for Coleen say she has irrefutable evidence that the leaks came from Rebekah's account.

description: Wayne Rooney's wife has returned to social media for the first time since she accused Rebekah's account of leaking stories about her
